title: Tuesday’s best deals: M1 iPad Pro $100 off, Philips Hue gear from $16, Bose QC 45  headphones, more
content:
All of Tuesday’s best deals are now up for the taking with $100 off Apple’s latest 12.9-inch M1 iPad Pros leading the way. That’s alongside a refurbished Philips Hue HomeKit lighting sale from $16 and the second-ever discount on the Bose QuietComfort 45 ANC Headphones. Hit the jump for all that and more in the latest 9to5Toys Lunch Break.

more…

description: M1 iPad Pro deals deliver the best prices since Black Friday at $100 off alongside a Philips Hue sale from $16 and more.
